patches.title: FM26 26.3.0 Major Update
patches.summary: Major tactical AI improvements including smarter pressing trap management, reworked set piece delivery and movement, and defensive shape adjustments. AI managers now adapt formations more dynamically during matches.

tacticalChanges.description: AI teams now manage pressing traps more intelligently, coordinating pressing triggers between lines. Simple high-press systems are less effective against organized teams.
Corner kick delivery accuracy and movement patterns significantly improved. Short corner routines are now more viable.
Teams recover defensive shape faster during transitions, reducing the effectiveness of quick counter-attacks through the middle.
Wing-backs and wide midfielders now balance attacking width with defensive tracking more realistically. Overlapping runs are better timed.

knownIssues: Occasional delayed goalkeeper distribution after catching crosses
Rare crash when loading complex opposition instructions with 3+ conditional triggers

patches.title: FM26 26.2.1 Hotfix
patches.summary: Hotfix addressing striker movement issues identified in 26.2.0, plus stability fixes. Minor adjustment to central midfield pressing ranges.

tacticalChanges.description: Fixed issue where lone strikers would drift wide too frequently in 4-1-4-1 and 4-2-3-1 formations. Strikers now respect positional instructions more consistently.
Central midfielders now have slightly wider pressing trigger zones, improving ball recovery in central areas.

patches.title: FM26 26.2.0 Update
patches.summary: Major update introducing improved Data Hub analytics, revised AI substitution logic, and several match engine refinements affecting defensive positioning and crossing accuracy.

tacticalChanges.description: Crossing accuracy now better reflects player attributes. High Crossing + high Technique players deliver significantly better balls. Low-quality crossers are less effective.
Teams using narrow defensive width now maintain shape more consistently, closing central channels more effectively but leaving flanks more exposed.
AI managers now make more intelligent substitutions based on match context, including tactical subs to change formation when trailing.

knownIssues: Lone strikers in 4-1-4-1 may drift wide excessively (fixed in 26.2.1)

patches.title: FM26 26.1.3 Tactical Refinement Update
patches.summary: Significant match engine update with defensive improvements against strikerless formations, pressing and marking logic changes, OOP shape behavior fixes, and the reintroduction of Pass Maps into the match UI and Data Hub.

tacticalChanges.description: AI teams now defend more effectively against strikerless formations. Defenders track deeper-lying forward runners better and midfield coverage improves.
Marking decisions during pressing phases are more intelligent. Players now prioritize marking the most dangerous passing options rather than always pressing the ball carrier.
Fixed issue where wide attacking midfielders in OOP shape would not respect width instructions correctly, particularly in 4-4-2 defensive blocks.
Pass Maps are now available again in both the match UI and Data Hub, providing visual analysis of passing networks and patterns.

knownIssues: Crash hotfix needed for opposition instructions with responsibility conflicts

patches.title: FM26 26.1.0 First Major Update
patches.summary: First major post-launch update addressing match engine issues including near-post shot frequency, defender reaction times, and counter-attacking movement. Also fixed custom tactics files not loading if renamed.

tacticalChanges.description: Reduced frequency of near-post shots which were overpowered at launch. Goalkeepers now position better for near-post attempts.
Improved defender reaction times to through balls and crosses. Defenders now track runners more consistently in their peripheral vision.
Players making forward runs during counter-attacks now time their movement better, reducing offside calls and improving the quality of chances created on the break.

knownIssues: Custom tactic files may not load if filename contains special characters
